GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: Handset, Charger, Data Cable, Headset, Product and Safety Information Booklet, Battery

Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports H.264, H.263, MPEG-4, VC-1, WMV 9, 3GPP, ASF, AVC

Camera.Other Camera Features: Touch Focus, Auto and Manual Exposure, Geo-tagging, Auto and Manual White Balance, Face Recognition, Full Screen View Finder, Center Weighted Auto Exposure, Image Editor

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v2.1, Supported Profiles (A2DP 1.2, HSP 1.1, HFP 1.5, PBAP 1.0, EDR, AVRCP 1.0)
Internet & Connectivity.Navigation Technology: A-GPS, with Nokia Maps, Bing Maps

Other Features.Additional Features: MMS Enabled, 3D Graphics HW Accelerator, Flight Mode, Micro SIM, Nokia Drive, MS Office, Notes, Audio Streaming, Firmware Update Device Lock, Device Passcode, PIN Code, Digital Clock, Calculator, Calendar, Alarm Clock, Reminders, To-do List, Audio Recording, Voice Input
Other Features.Important Apps: Facebook, Flickr, Picasa, Twitter, YouTube, Hotmail, Yahoo, Gmail, Instant Messaging
Other Features.Sensors: Accelerometer, Proximity Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories
